messages.message:
hello, im not sure if this is crafting-specific, but im unable to open Build projects UI via crafting. im getting a few errors in the frontend : `Uncaught Error: Cannot find module 'codemirror/lib/codemirror.css'`

anyone know how to fix this?
agree this is likely not a crafting issue -- @Serena could you help pull in one of the frontend folks to help Vishnu when someone has time?
ah we installed a new dependency in the frontend code called `codemirror`
can you cd into `webserver/shared/src/js/webpacked` and run `yarn install`?
You'll also need to restart webpack after installing
